text:
No matter how much we complained over endless wedding ceremonies and receptions of celebrity couple Nick Jonas and Priyanka Chopra, we all secretly gushed and ogled at those pictures. As dreamy as each and every frame was, not many know that the nuptials cost the couple more than $800,000 (as claimed by E!News)!
Instagram
Well, yes, that's what it takes to put together a wedding of this grand scale with multiple ceremonies and countless wedding receptions. There were several memes around the endless receptions that PC and Nick hosted in India and America and now, Nick Jonas himself took a dig at the whole wedding madness.
Instagram
He made a really funny confession about his wedding with Priyanka Chopra during the Carpool Karaoke segment that aired Thursday on The Late Late Show on CBS.
Don't Miss 186 SHARES 12.5 K SHARES 5.4 K SHARES 3.4 K SHARES 3.1 K SHARES
Instagram
It was when Host James Corden asked Nick -who had a lie detector on- 'Was there a point during your many weddings that you thought, ''I'm done with these weddings?''' While Nick took a few seconds to answer this one, he was prompt enough to answer it with a dash of humor. He said, 'Yes. It's when I looked at the bill!'
Well, we are not surprised. Nick and Priyanka tied the knot in December with two weddings and multiple wedding receptions in India and the U.S!

title: Nick Jonas Takes A Dig At His Multiple Weddings To PC, Says He Was 'Done' After Seeing The Bill!
